item.title: Beyond the terrarium?
item.description: There is a mismatch between our ideals for digital product development and the reality of it. We speak of bridging the gap between business and IT, taking a seat at the table, direct customer involvement, self-organizing teams owning business outcomes. But the reality is this: Software development teams are like silkworms, living inside a protective terrarium, sheltered from the chaotic, toxic environment of the rest of the business. Autonomy is confined to the walls of the terrarium.
